name: part_000
file: tmp_【３DLive】晴れ時々にわかミオ【 #大神ミオ生誕ライブ2024 】 [VzecQUmB1sY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence with intro music and waiting screen.
Performance of the song 'Howling' by Ookami Mio.
Performance of the song 'Yakou Tsuushin' by Ookami Mio.
Performance of the song 'Yoake no Melow' by Ookami Mio.
scenes.song_name: 夜明けのメロウ (Yoake no Melow)

subtitles.original: 静寂に響いてよ My Howling
subtitles.english: Echo through the silence, my howling

subtitles.original:
Howling
作詞・作曲：ZAQ 編曲：KanadeYUK
subtitles.english:
Howling
Lyrics/Composition: ZAQ Arrangement: KanadeYUK

subtitles.original: 瞬きは弧描き、月へ響く
subtitles.english: A twinkle draws an arc, echoing to the moon

subtitles.original: 爪弾く道 金瞳の群れ 共に嘆く夜
subtitles.english:
The strummed path, the golden-eyed pack,
nights we lament together

subtitles.original: 伝播する想いは心強くする
subtitles.english: These feelings that spread make the heart stronger

subtitles.original: 共に行こうよ 隣に君がいるから
subtitles.english: Let's go together, because you're by my side

subtitles.original: 私は迷わない
subtitles.english: I will not hesitate

subtitles.original: 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: Toward the path where the light shines

subtitles.original: LISTEN TO MY HOWLING...
subtitles.english: LISTEN TO MY HOWLING...

subtitles.original: 狼が止まることはない
subtitles.english: The wolf will never stop

subtitles.original: 聞こえますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: 聞こえますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original:
夜充通信
作詞・作曲・編曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Yakou Tsuushin
Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: Horie Shouta

subtitles.original: ハローハロー 聞こえますか そっちは何年？
subtitles.english: Hello, hello, can you hear me? What year is it there?

subtitles.original: 正しく分かり合う手段は一つじゃないさ
subtitles.english: There's more than one way to truly understand each other

subtitles.original:
例えお星様はどこへ行くのか
さよならはいつ誰が決めるの
subtitles.english:
No matter where the stars go
Who decides when to say goodbye, and when?

subtitles.original: その手に触れようと願ってる 本当さ
subtitles.english: I'm wishing to touch those hands, it's the truth

subtitles.original: 永遠の夜光 君に歌う
subtitles.english: An eternal night light, I sing for you

subtitles.original: 世界中が君にいじわるでも
subtitles.english: Even if the whole world is mean to you

subtitles.original:
思い出して 覚えていて 瞼の裏
ずっとまた会えるからね
subtitles.english:
Recall it, remember it, behind your eyelids
We can always meet again

subtitles.original:
穏やかに 健やかに 流れる月
君だって私だって
subtitles.english:
Gently, healthily, the moon flows
Both you and me

subtitles.original: 消えるのは 言葉だけ
subtitles.english: The only things that disappear are words

subtitles.original:
ふんわり君を抱きしめてあげるからね
泣かないで
subtitles.english:
I'll gently hold you close
So please don't cry

subtitles.original:
夜明けのメロウ
作詞：MegRi 作曲・編曲：如月結愛 (Arte Refact)
subtitles.english:
Yoake no Melow
Lyrics: MegRi Comp/Arr: Kisaragi Yua (Arte Refact)

subtitles.original: 変わりゆくもの 終わりゆくもの
subtitles.english: Things that change, things that end

subtitles.original: 一つ 瞬くように
subtitles.english: Like a single twinkle

subtitles.original: 確かめていたい 霞む世界に
subtitles.english: I want to be sure, in this hazy world
